attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC have been spending the fee payers money on random pieces of art, overpaying presenters and cutting back on good programme making.

We would like to see the removal of the leaders of the BBC and that they are replaced with responsible people who understand the value of money and invest this money in good programmes across the board and not on random pieces of 'art' or over blown salaries for presenters or senior management.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
